name: Divine Call
description: Divine Shield's remaining cooldown is reduced by 5 sec when you take damage. This effect can only occur once every <dynamic>30.0 sec - 15 sec</dynamic>.

name: Shielding Words
description: Casting Word of Glory grants you a shield that prevents damage equal to <dynamic>15.0% - 30%</dynamic> of the healing done by Word of Glory. Lasts 10 sec.

name: Golden Path
description: Consecration heals you for <dynamic>[200 / 100 * (5% of Attack power)] - [480 / 100 * (5% of Attack power)]</dynamic> every 1 sec while standing within it.

name: Stalwart as a Crusader
description: Crusader Aura reduces the duration of incoming Fear effects on your allies by <dynamic>30.0% - 60%</dynamic>.

name: Light's Barding
description: Divine Steed's duration is increased by <dynamic>50.0% - 100%</dynamic>.

name: Wrench Evil
description: Turn Evil's cast time is reduced by <dynamic>50% - 100%</dynamic>, and its range is increased by 10 yds.

name: Echoing Blessings
description: Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic>. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by <dynamic>5.0%</dynamic>. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.

name: Expurgation
description: Your Blade of Justice critical hits cause the target to burn for <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic> of the damage dealt every 2 sec for 6 sec.

name: Truth's Wake
description: Wake of Ashes burns the target for an additional <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic> damage over 6 sec.

name: Virtuous Command
description: Judgment grants you Virtuous Command for 6 sec, which gives your Templar's Verdict, Crusader Strike, Blade of Justice, and auto attacks a 40% chance to deal <dynamic>20.0% - 48%</dynamic> additional Holy damage.

name: Templar's Vindication
description: Templar's Verdict has a <dynamic>20.0% - 48%</dynamic> chance to strike again for 15% of its damage.

name: Enkindled Spirit
description: Aura Mastery increases the healing of your next 3 Light of Dawns by <dynamic>40.0% - 96%</dynamic>.

name: Resplendent Light
description: Holy Light heals up to 5 targets within 8 yds for <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic> of its healing.

name: Focused Light
description: Holy Shock's critical effect chance is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 12%</dynamic>.

name: Untempered Dedication
description: Light of the Martyr's damage and healing is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 5%</dynamic> each time it is cast. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 15 sec.

name: Vengeful Shock
description: Avenger's Shield causes your target to take <dynamic>15.0% - 45%</dynamic> increased Holy damage from you for 5 sec.

name: Punish the Guilty
description: Shield of the Righteous deals <dynamic>50% - 120%</dynamic> more damage to targets affected by Judgment.

name: Resolute Defender
description: Shield of the Righteous extends Ardent Defender's duration by <dynamic>25.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Royal Decree
description: Guardian of Ancient Kings's cooldown is reduced by <dynamic>15.0 sec - 30 sec</dynamic>, and casting it causes your next Word of Glory to cost no Holy Power.

name: The Long Summer
description: Blessing of Summer lasts <dynamic>30.0% - 60%</dynamic> longer.

name: Righteous Might
description: Vanquisher's Hammer deals <dynamic>100% - 250%</dynamic> increased damage, and heals you for the damage done.

name: Hallowed Discernment
description: Ashen Hallow strikes the lowest health ally and enemy within it an additional time for <dynamic>40.0% - 96%</dynamic> of its effect.

name: Ringing Clarity
description: Divine Toll has a <dynamic>40.0% - 96%</dynamic> chance to cast 2 extra time on the main target.
